name: David Desmet Public Affairs
goal: Advising the pharmaceutical, medical devices, dental and biotechnology industry on public affairs, public relations and communications. Specific interest in public affairs of medical, dental and paramedical professionnal organizations.
interests: Communication, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Proportionality test with respect to medical, dental and paramedical professions
